chapters.name: Knowing Our Numbers
key_topics: Indian and international place value system
learning_outcomes: Reads and writes numbers up to at least 9 digits.
Estimates sums and differences using rounding.

chapters.name: Whole Numbers
learning_outcomes: Represents whole numbers on a number line.
Uses basic properties of operations to simplify calculations.

chapters.name: Playing with Numbers
learning_outcomes: Finds HCF and LCM of small numbers.
Applies divisibility rules to test divisibility quickly.

chapters.name: Basic Geometrical Ideas
key_topics: Curves, polygons and circles (radius, diameter, chord)
learning_outcomes: Uses correct terms for basic geometrical objects.
Identifies elements of circles and polygons in figures.

chapters.name: Understanding Elementary Shapes
key_topics: Right, acute, obtuse and reflex angles
learning_outcomes: Measures angles using a protractor to nearest degree.
Classifies triangles and quadrilaterals by sides and angles.

chapters.name: Integers
learning_outcomes: Represents integers on number line.
Adds and subtracts integers using rules and diagrams.

chapters.name: Fractions
key_topics: Addition and subtraction of like fractions
learning_outcomes: Finds equivalent fractions and simplifies them.
Adds and subtracts fractions with same denominators.

chapters.name: Decimals
key_topics: Addition and subtraction of decimals (money, length)
learning_outcomes: Reads and writes decimals to two or three places.
Adds and subtracts decimals in practical contexts.

chapters.name: Data Handling
learning_outcomes: Collects data and organises in a frequency table.
Interprets bar graphs and answers related questions.

chapters.name: Mensuration
learning_outcomes: Calculates perimeter and area of rectangles and squares.
Uses appropriate units for length and area.

chapters.name: Algebra
learning_outcomes: Represents patterns using simple algebraic expressions.
Substitutes values to evaluate expressions.

chapters.name: Ratio and Proportion
learning_outcomes: Expresses comparison of two quantities as ratio.
Identifies if two ratios form a proportion.

chapters.name: Symmetry
key_topics: Line(s) of symmetry in regular shapes
learning_outcomes: Finds lines of symmetry of given figures.
Creates symmetrical designs using folding or drawing.

chapters.name: Practical Geometry
key_topics: Drawing line segments of given length
learning_outcomes: Constructs line segments and circles accurately.
Draws perpendiculars from a point on and outside a line.
